name: ChristFellowship
0:
”Alexa, open Christ Fellowship”
”Alexa, ask Christ Fellowship for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Christ Fellowship”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christ fellowship
des: Welcome to the weekly audio podcast for Christ Fellowship Church in Kingsport, Tennessee where our vision is to equip individuals to be all God designed them to be. Our desire is that this podcast will encourage you in your relationship with God. Visit us at http://christfellowship.me for sermon videos and other content. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
